question:
The ‘Leadership Group for Industry Transition’ was constituted during the September Climate Summit. In this context, consider the following statements:
  1. India is a part of this group.
  2. The project is to be supported by the World Economic Forum
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: India is a part of this international group. Sweden and India will be leading the Leadership Group for Industry Transition. Apart from India, countries like South Korea, UK, Germany, Finland, Netherland, France, Ireland etc. are also members of the group. Statement 2 is correct: The group will be supported by the WEF apart from European Climate Foundation, Energy Transitions Commission, Stockholm Environment Institute, etc. Several private bodies will also be part of the group. The aim of the group is to move from GHG emitters to low carbon economies.
